snippet: President Obama’s meeting with the Communist official, Nguyen Phu Trong, was timed to mark the 20th anniversary of normalized relations between the onetime war enemies.
abstract: Pres Obama welcomes Vietnamese Communist Party head Nguyen Phu Trong to White House, saying countries are ready to move beyond their troubled history and work together on security and trade; visit comes on 20th anniversary of normalized relationships between former war enemies and on 40th anniversary of fall of Saigon.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s meeting with the Communist official, Nguyen Phu Trong, was timed to mark the 20th anniversary of normalized relations between the onetime war enemies.

headline.main: Obama Hosts a Top Official From Vietnam at Oval Office
headline.print_headline: Obama Hosts a Top Official From Vietnam at Oval Office

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
